walker.easydb.dao
Class SqlParamMap

java.lang.Object
  walker.easydb.dao.SqlParamMap

public class SqlParamMap
extends java.lang.Object

本类为参数化SQL装载参数值。 This class loads the parameters for the parameterized sql.

Author:
HuQingmiao

Method Detail

put

public void put(int index,
                EString value)
         throws IllegalParamException
将参数(SQL中的'?')的位置与参数值关联起来。 Associates the specified value with the specified key in this map.

Parameters:
index - the position of '?' mark in the parameterized sql, it begins from 1.
value - the value
Throws:
IllegalParamException

get

public java.lang.Object get(int index)
取得指定位置的参数值。 Retrieve the value that need to fill the '?' mark in the parameterized sql.

Parameters:
index - the position of '?' mark in the parameterized sql, it begins with 1.
Returns:
the parameter value on the posision 'index'

size

public int size()
取得参数值的总量。 Retrieve the size of map.

Returns:
the size of map

clear

public void clear()
清空所有参数值. Removes all mappings from this map.
